text: Sprecher von Bernegg is a noble family from Switzerland. Sprecher von Bernegg may refer to: * Sprecher von Bernegg family, a Swiss noble house Sprecher von Bernegg is the surname of: * Anton Adolf Christoph Sprecher von Bernegg (1849–1915), a judge at the German Reichsgericht * Fortunat Sprecher von Bernegg (1585–1647), a Swiss lawyer and diplomat * Soloman Sprecher von Bernegg (1697-1758), a Habsburg field marshall * Theophil Sprecher von Bernegg (1850–1927), a Swiss politician and Chief of the General staff * Andreas Sprecher von Bernegg (1871–1951), a Swiss botanist * Jörg Sprecher von Bernegg (1907–1997), Swiss member of the General staff, nephew of Theophil Sprecher von Bernegg
title: Sprecher von Bernegg
